name: DesktopVRIK
author: NotAKidoS
description:
Adds VRIK to Desktop avatars. No longer will you be a liveless sliding statue~!
Adds the small feet stepping when looking around on Desktop.

Optional BTKUILib integration.
changelog:
- Fixes for 2023r173.
- Fixed ResetFootstepsOnIdle not working as intended.
- Added swimming pitch control.
- Added active body offset.
